login_tutorial.email_description: This is where you type the email address you used to create your account. Your email is like your digital name that helps us recognize you.
login_tutorial.password_description: Type your secret password here. The password keeps your account safe. Tap the eye icon üëÅÔ∏è to show or hide your password while typing.
login_tutorial.login_description: After entering your email and password, tap this blue button to enter your account.
login_tutorial.signup_description: If you don't have an account yet, tap here to create one. It's free and only takes a few minutes to get started with learning

signup_tutorial.name_description: Type your full name here exactly as you want it to appear in your account. This helps personalize your learning experience.
signup_tutorial.email_description: Enter your email address here. Make sure it's an email you can access, as we may send important information to this address.
signup_tutorial.password_description: Create a strong password that you can remember. For safety, your password will appear as dots ‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢. Tap the eye icon üëÅÔ∏è if you want to see what you're typing.
signup_tutorial.dob_description: Tap here to select your date of birth. This helps us provide age-appropriate content and keep your account secure.
signup_tutorial.gender_description: Choose your gender from the options. This information helps us better understand our community's needs.
signup_tutorial.signup_description: When you've filled all the information, tap this blue button to create your account and start learning!
signup_tutorial.login_description: If you already have an account, tap here to go back to the login page and access your account.

qr_tutorial.landing_description: Tap this button to scan any QR code and make instant payments at shops and restaurants.
qr_tutorial.qr_scanning1_description: This is what a QR code looks like.
qr_tutorial.qr_scanning2_description: You can upload a QR code from your mobile's photos by clicking this button.
qr_tutorial.qr_scanning3_description: You can scan the QR code by pointing your camera to the QR code image provided by the receiver. Make sure the QR code shows up on the screen of your phone.
qr_tutorial.qr_scanning4_description: For now if you do not have a QR code to scan, click on next to go to the next step.
qr_tutorial.enter_amount1_description: This is the Account name of the person you are sending money to. Make sure the name of the person you actually are intending to send shows up.
qr_tutorial.enter_amount2_description: Enter the amount you want to send to the recipient. Make sure to enter the correct amount.
qr_tutorial.enter_amount3_description: Once you've entered the amount, click this button to proceed to the payment confirmation screen.
qr_tutorial.enter_amount3_actionText: Click on Proceed to Pay button to continue
qr_tutorial.enter_amount4_description: Review the payment details including the total amount and the bank account that will be used for the payment.
qr_tutorial.enter_amount5_description: Click the Pay button to complete your payment. You'll be asked to enter your PIN for security.
qr_tutorial.enter_amount5_actionText: Click on Pay button to continue
qr_tutorial.enter_pin1_description: Double-check the recipient name and amount before proceeding. Make sure everything is correct.
qr_tutorial.enter_pin2_description: Your UPI PIN is a secure password for authorizing payments. Never share your UPI PIN with anyone even your friends or officials. Bank officials will never ask for your PIN either.
qr_tutorial.enter_pin3_description: Enter your carefully as you have limited attempts. As you enter, the dashes will change to dots representing an entered digit.
qr_tutorial.enter_pin4_description: This is an encrypted keyboard that you have to use to enter your secret PIN.
qr_tutorial.enter_pin5_description: Once you have entered the PIN click on check mark to send money.
qr_tutorial.enter_pin5_actiontext: Click on the check mark to continue
